name: Almost Naked Ninjas vs Monsters, Dragons & Witches Multiplayer FREE Games - By Dead Cool Apps
name_original: Almost Naked Ninjas vs Monsters, Dragons & Witches Multiplayer FREE Games - By Dead Cool Apps
description:
"Nude Ninja Action - OMG!"

Every year the Naked Ninjas gather at the temple
ruin to race and battle to the death, it's the only time
they remove their sacred shinobi shozoko (ninja suit).

Choose your hero and race against friends, feel the wind
on your skin as you race stark naked to be victorious!

FEATURES:

• A real time multiplayer experience - race friends in real time!

• Awesome power ups include:
-> Bombs - Blow up all enemies on the screen
-> Potions - Speed up and Freeze
-> Magnets - Attract all stars on the screen

• Multiple characters, varying abilities, speed and weapons
• Collect stars to upgrade characters
• Old school retro 16bit graphics

Easy to play - hard to master, Download now for FREE.

Your Naked Ninja is waiting for you...
